alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:36PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1235 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 8 miles east of Wells, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Ruby Valley, Montello, Oasis, Currie, Clover Valley, Pequop Summit, Angel Lake, Moor Summit, White Horse Pass, Secret Pass, Silver Zone Pass and Hd Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
